remarks: The area of a rectangle whose sides are parallel to the coordinate axes in ` ( RR X. RR ) ` is its width multiplied by its height.  (Contributed by Jon Pennant, 19-Mar-2019.)
statement:
arearect.1 $e |- A e. RR $.
arearect.2 $e |- B e. RR $.
arearect.3 $e |- C e. RR $.
arearect.4 $e |- D e. RR $.
arearect.5 $e |- A <_ B $.
arearect.6 $e |- C <_ D $.
arearect.7 $e |- S = ( ( A [,] B ) X. ( C [,] D ) ) $.
arearect $p |- ( area ` S ) = ( ( B - A ) x. ( D - C ) ) $.
